group_1.textRight: ...[wait:0.8][chara:300301:cheek_0][chara:300301:motion_300][chara:300301:lipSynch_1]I see...
So that "desire" I once held...
will lead to such a terrifying figure when I despair...

group_1.textLeft: Please tell me more about it.

group_1.textRight: Ah, that's right...

group_1.textCenter: A long time ago, I tried to make@a potion to make myself taller.
But I ended up making a toxic@gas that nearly killed me...
At that time, I formed a contract as a Magical Girl@and survived, but...
Undeterred, I tried to make another growth potion,
and that one ended in failure too...

group_1.textLeft: Is your despair about failure, then?

group_1.textRight: No, that's not it.
Looking at this picture of my Witch...
It seems I had even more of a complex@about my figure than I realized,
and I harbored this fear of being@unable to realize my ideal image...
But now I can see it.
This complex will pave the way for my research!
Ah, research into a safe growth potion!

group_1.textLeft: So you still haven't learned your lesson.

group_1.textRight: I won't give up after only two failures.
But still...
Even if I can't make it, that's okay.
In that case, I'll research extending heels instead.
Clothing that looks more adult... No, it's also good@to research the clothes themselves.
I could even research makeup scientifically.
Until the day I'm satisfied, I'll continue my research.
Even if I don't grow taller, I can expand@the possibilities in my research field.
That's the ambition of a scientist!

group_1.textLeft: It's up to you to decide what you want to develop.
